de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui
Class WindowConnector

java.lang.Object
  de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.WindowConnector

public class WindowConnector
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for the execution of all actions which will be performed after an event in the main class occured

proceedWithUnsavedFile

public boolean proceedWithUnsavedFile()
Checks if the opened file has unsaved changes and asks the user to change them if so

Returns:
True if the user saved oder decided against, false if the user wants to abort the action
